org.openimaj.citation.annotation.output

Interface ReferenceFormatter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StandardFormatters

    public interface ReferenceFormatter
    The ReferenceFormatter defines an interface for objects capable of converting Reference and References objects into Strings.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
    See Also:
    for standard implementations

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String format(Collection<Reference> refs)
      Format a multiples references
      String format(Reference ref)
      Format a single reference

        Returns:
